configure-setting-wgAllDBsAreLocalhost: Silently rewrite all database connections to the local host
configure-setting-wgDBAvgStatusPoll: Average time between SHOW STATUS queries in overload conditions
configure-setting-wgDBerrorLog: File to log database errors to
configure-setting-wgDBname: Name of the database to use
configure-setting-wgDBserver: Host name or IP address of database server
configure-setting-wgDBuser: Username to log into database with
configure-setting-wgLocalDatabases: Other databases which can be administered from this server
configure-setting-wgSearchType: Type of database search to use. Set to a class name to override to a custom search engine
configure-setting-wgGenerateThumbnailOnP: Generate thumbnails when pages containing them are parsed
configure-setting-wgShowArchiveThumbnail: Show thumbnails for old images on the image description page
configure-setting-wgIgnoreImageErrors: Do not display error messages for images
configure-setting-wgImageLimits: Image size limits for description pages
configure-setting-wgMaxAnimatedGifArea: Maximum area in pixels for animated GIFs
configure-setting-wgMaxImageArea: Maximum area in pixels for images
configure-setting-wgMediaHandlers: Plugins for media file type handling
configure-setting-wgThumbnailScriptPath: Path to thumb.php for thumbnail generation on-the-fly instead of on-parse
configure-setting-wgThumbUpright: Width adjustment factor for upright thumbnails
configure-setting-wgShowEXIF: Show Exif data on file description pages
configure-setting-wgUpdateCompatibleMeta: Automatically update the img_metadata field if it is outdated, but compatible with the current version
configure-setting-wgUseImageResize: Enable dynamic server side image resizing
configure-setting-wgEnableAutoRotation: Rotate images accordingly to their EXIF orientation
configure-setting-wgTrustedMediaFormats: Media types and MIME types which are considered 'safe'
configure-setting-wgImgAuthDetails: Display details why access failed in img_auth.php
configure-setting-wgImgAuthPublicTest: Check whether images are publically accessible and display an error on img_auth.php if this is the case
configure-setting-wgTiffThumbnailType: File extension and MIME type used to transform TIFF images to
configure-setting-wgCachePrefix: Custom value for the cache prefix
configure-setting-wgClockSkewFudge: Fudge time to add to cache timestamps to adjust for clock skew
configure-setting-wgInvalidateCacheOnLoc: Invalidate various caches when LocalSettings.php changes
configure-setting-wgFileCacheDepth: Depth of the subdirectory hierarchy to be created under $wgFileCacheDirectory
configure-setting-wgForcedRawSMaxage: Default maximum age for raw CSS/JS access
configure-setting-wgQueryCacheLimit: Number of rows to cache in 'querycache' table
configure-setting-wgRevisionCacheExpiry: Expiry for caching of revision text in memcached (or 0 to disable)
configure-setting-wgEnableImageWhitelist: Enable the use of "MediaWiki:External file whitelist"
configure-setting-wgAllowImageTag: Allow tag to be used in wikitext
configure-setting-wgExpensiveParserFunct: Maximum number of calls per parse to expensive parser functions
configure-setting-wgExternalLinkTarget: Default target attribute for external links
configure-setting-wgGrammarForms: Grammar forms for GRAMMAR parser function
configure-setting-wgMaxPPExpandDepth: Stack depth limit for preprocessor template expansion
configure-setting-wgMaxPPNodeCount: Maximum number of nodes the preprocessor will parse
configure-setting-wgMaxTocLevel: Maximum indent level for tables of contents
configure-setting-wgParserTestRemote: Specifies target CodeReview installation to send test result data when executing "parserTests.php --upload"
configure-setting-wgRegisterInternalExte: Register external links pointing to same server
configure-setting-wgRestrictDisplayTitle: Require use of <nowiki>{{DISPLAYTITLE}}</nowiki> to normalize to the same canonical page title
configure-setting-wgAmericanDates: Require 'May 12' instead of '12 May' in English
configure-setting-wgDisableTitleConversi: Disable language variant conversion for page titles
configure-setting-wgForceUIMsgAsContentM: UI messages to treat as content messages
configure-setting-wgInterwikiMagic: Show interwiki links in a special list
configure-setting-wgLegacyEncoding: Former encoding of the site to convert from
configure-setting-wgLoginLanguageSelecto: Show a language selector on user login and registration forms
configure-setting-wgUseDatabaseMessages: Allow use of the MediaWiki namespace to edit messages
configure-setting-wgEditPageFrameOptions: Allow embedding the edit form in a frame
configure-setting-wgCapitalLinks: First character in all page titles is uppercase
configure-setting-wgExemptFromUserRobots: Namespaces which do not allow use of <nowiki>__INDEX__</nowiki> and <nowiki>__NOINDEX__</nowiki>
configure-setting-wgDisabledVariants: Disabled variants for language variant conversion
configure-setting-wgCanonicalLanguageLin: Enable canonical language links in meta data
configure-setting-wgHideInterlanguageLin: Hide interlanguage links from the sidebar
configure-setting-wgLegalTitleChars: Characters permitted in page titles (regex character class)
configure-setting-wgMaxRedirects: Maximum number of redirects to follow when resolving redirects
configure-setting-wgNoFollowDomainExcept: External links to these domain names (or any subdomains) will not have the rel="nofollow" attribute
configure-setting-wgPageShowWatchingUser: Show which users are watching a page
configure-setting-wgAjaxLicensePreview: Use AJAX to preview licensing for uploads
configure-setting-wgAllowCopyUploads: Allow uploads to be made by URL
configure-setting-wgCopyUploadsDomains: A list of domains copy uploads can come from
configure-setting-wgUploadStashMaxAge: Maximum age of temporary (incomplete) uploaded files, in seconds
configure-setting-wgExportAllowAll: Allow exporting the entire wiki into a single file from [[Special:Export]]
configure-setting-wgExportAllowHistory: Allow exports to include full history
configure-setting-wgExportAllowListContr: Allow a list of contributors to be exported
configure-setting-wgExportFromNamespaces: Allow the "export all pages in namespace" option in [[Special:Export]]
configure-setting-wgExportMaxLinkDepth: Maximum value of the "pagelink-depth" parameter in [[Special:Export]]
configure-setting-wgMaxRedirectLinksRetr: Maximum number of links to a redirect page listed on [[Special:Whatlinkshere/RedirectDestination]]
configure-setting-wgQueryPageDefaultLimi: Default number of entries to show on special pages which are query-pages such as [[Special:Whatlinkshere]]
configure-setting-wgRedirectOnLogin: Redirect users to this page on login
configure-setting-wgSecureLogin: Let user authenticate using HTTPS when they come from HTTP
configure-setting-wgUseNPPatrol: Use new pages patrolling to check for vandalism
configure-setting-wgAutopromote: Conditions of automatic promotion of user to specific groups
configure-setting-wgAutopromoteOnce: Conditions of automatic promotion of user to specific groups that are done only once
configure-setting-wgAccountCreationThrot: Number of accounts each IP address may create
configure-setting-wgBlockCIDRLimit: Maximum CIDR range when blocking an IP address range
configure-setting-wgAutoblockExpiry: Number of seconds before autoblock entries expire
configure-setting-wgDeleteRevisionsLimit: Integer of how many revisions a page must have before the ''bigdelete'' right is required to delete it
configure-setting-wgNewPasswordExpiry: The time, in seconds, when an emailed temporary password expires
configure-setting-wgEmailConfirmToEdit: Require users to confirm email address before they can edit
configure-setting-wgImplicitGroups: Groups which are not shown on [[Special:ListUsers]] et al
configure-setting-wgReadOnly: Disallows editing, displaying the string given as the reason
configure-setting-wgReadOnlyFile: File with reason of database lock
configure-setting-wgSummarySpamRegex: Spam filter regular expressions for edit summaries
configure-setting-wgEmailAuthentication: Require authentication of email addresses for email functions
configure-setting-wgNoReplyAddress: Dummy address which should be accepted during email send action
configure-setting-wgPasswordReminderRese: Minimum time, in hours, which must elapse between password reminders
configure-setting-wgAdditionalMailParams: Additional email parameters, will be passed as the last argument to mail() PHP function call
configure-setting-wgUserEmailConfirmatio: The time in seconds until a confirmation code sent by email expires
configure-setting-wgDebugComments: Include portions of log output in page HTML comment
configure-setting-wgDebugDumpSql: Dump SQL queries to debug output
configure-setting-wgDebugRawPage: Leave requests for CSS/JS pages out of debug log
configure-setting-wgDebugRedirects: Displays redirect location instead of actually redirecting to the target URL
configure-setting-wgDebugPrintHttpHeader: Print HTTP headers for every request in the debug information
configure-setting-wgDebugTimestamps: Prefix debug messages with relative timestamp
configure-setting-wgDevelopmentWarnings: Throw PHP notices for some possible error conditions and for deprecated functions
configure-setting-wgShowExceptionDetails: Print a complete stack trace for exceptions
configure-setting-wgShowDBErrorBacktrace: Print a complete stack trace for database errors
configure-setting-wgShowDebug: Display debug data at the bottom of the main content area
configure-setting-wgJobRunRate: Number of jobs to run per page view
configure-setting-wgUpdateRowsPerJob: Number of rows to update per job
configure-setting-wgPoolCounterConf: Configuration for processing pool control, for use in high-traffic wikis
configure-setting-wgEnableJavaScriptTest: Allow running of JavaScript test suites via [[Special:JavaScriptTest]]
configure-setting-wgAPICacheHelpTimeout: Timeout for the API help text cache
configure-setting-wgAPIMaxDBRows: Maximum number of rows to scan in API database queries
configure-setting-wgAPIMaxResultSize: Maximum size (in bytes) of an API result
configure-setting-wgAPIMaxUncachedDiffs: Maximum number of uncached diffs that can be retrieved in one API request
configure-setting-wgDisableQueryPages: Disable all query pages if miser mode is on, not just some
configure-setting-wgEdititis: Display user edit counts in various prominent places
configure-setting-wgAllUnicodeFixes: Always convert certain Unicode sequences to modern ones regardless of the content language
configure-setting-wgFixArabicUnicode: Clean up archaic Unicode sequences in Arabic text
configure-setting-wgFixMalayalamUnicode: Clean up archaic Unicode sequences in Malayalam text
configure-setting-wgFixDoubleRedirects: Fix double redirects after a page move
configure-setting-wgInvalidRedirectTarge: Array of invalid page redirect targets
configure-setting-wgMaximumMovedPages: Maximum number of pages to move at once when moving subpages with a page
configure-setting-wgMemoryLimit: The minimum amount of memory that MediaWiki "needs"
configure-setting-wgShowHostnames: Expose hostnames through API and HTML comments
configure-setting-wgCacheVaryCookies: A list of cookies that vary the cache
configure-setting-wgCookiePath: Explicitly declared path for cookies at the cookie domain
configure-setting-wgInternalServer: Internal server name as known to Squid, if different
configure-setting-wgMaxSquidPurgeTitles: Maximum number of page titles to purge in any one client operation
configure-setting-wgSquidServers: A list of proxy servers (IP-addresses if possible) to purge on changes
configure-setting-wgSquidServersNoPurge: A list of proxy servers (IP-addresses if possible) to not purge on changes
configure-setting-wgUseESI: Required setting when using Squid3 with ESI support
configure-setting-wgUseXVO: Send X-Vary-Options header for better caching (requires patched Squid)
configure-setting-wgVaryOnXFP: Add X-Forwarded-Proto to the Vary and X-Vary-Options headers for API requests and RSS/Atom feeds
configure-setting-wgAllowSchemaUpdates: Allow database schema updates to be executed with update.php script
configure-setting-wgSpecialPageCacheUpda: Additional functions to be performed with updateSpecialPages.php
configure-setting-wgRevokePermissions: Rights revoked from users in each group
configure-setting-wgRateLimitsExcludedIP: IP addresses which are exempt from rate limits
configure-setting-wgAdvertisedFeedTypes: Feed types that should be provided by default
configure-setting-wgFeedCacheTimeout: 'Minimum' timeout in seconds for cached recent changes feed
configure-setting-wgEnableSearchContribu: Searching for IP addresses will redirect to their contributions page
configure-setting-wgGoToEdit: Go button goes straight to the edit screen if the page does not exist
configure-setting-wgSearchEverythingOnly: Make the "searcheverything" preference effective only for logged-in users
configure-setting-wgSearchSuggestCacheEx: Expiry time for search suggestion responses
configure-setting-wgCountTotalSearchHits: Let the search engine count total search matches to present in Special:Search
configure-setting-wgCountCategorizedImag: On [[Special:UnusedImages]], consider files used if they are put into a category
configure-setting-wgActiveUserDays: Time after which a user is inactive
configure-setting-wgArticleCountMethod: Method to determine if a page in a content namespace should be counted as a valid article
configure-setting-wgUseCommaCount: Use comma to count as a valid page (true) or use link to count as a valid page (false) counting pages
configure-setting-wgWantedPagesThreshold: Minimum number of links required before a page is listed on [[Special:WantedPages]]
configure-setting-wgVectorUseIconWatch: Watch and unwatch as an icon rather than a link
configure-setting-wgVectorUseSimpleSearc: Use an icon search button rather than Go & Search buttons
configure-setting-wgContentNamespaces: Namespaces which are considered to contain real content, or pages
configure-setting-wgNamespaceProtection-: List of rights granting right to edit ''(one per line)''
configure-setting-wgNamespacesToBeSearch: Namespaces to be searched when user clicks the "{{int:searchprofile-project}}" tab on [[{{#special:search}}]]
configure-setting-wgPreviewOnOpenNamespa: Namespaces which have special treatment by having preview on open
configure-setting-wgSitemapNamespaces: Namespaces to place in the site map
configure-setting-wgCategoryMagicGallery: Show a thumbnail gallery on category pages
configure-setting-wgCategoryPagingLimit: Paging limit for items in categories
configure-setting-wgCategoryCollation: Collation used to sort category members
configure-setting-wgShowCreditsIfMax: Credit only the top authors if there are too many
configure-setting-wgUseCopyrightUpload: Use detailed copyright information on upload
configure-setting-wgAllowUserSkin: Allow users to change their skin
configure-setting-wgAllowUserCssPrefs: Allow user preferences implemented in CSS
configure-setting-wgDisableAnonTalk: Disable talk pages for anonymous users (not logged in)
configure-setting-wgInvalidUsernameChara: Characters to prevent during new account creations
configure-setting-wgUserrightsInterwikiD: Character used as a delimiter when testing for interwiki userrights
configure-setting-wgMaxNameChars: Maximum number of bytes in username
configure-setting-wgPasswordResetRoutes: Allowed ways to retrieve forgotten username or password
configure-setting-wgReservedUsernames: Account names reserved for the software
configure-setting-wgShowIPinHeader: Show the IP address in the user bar
configure-setting-wgBrowserBlackList: Browser blacklist for Unicode non compliant browsers
configure-setting-wgCommandLineDarkBg: Assume a dark background for maintenance scripts
configure-setting-wgUpgradeKey: Key to enable running upgrades on config/index.php
configure-setting-wgSend404Code: Send an HTTP 404 "not found" status code on non-existing pages
configure-setting-wgMaxShellFileSize: Maximum file size created by shell processes under Linux, in KB
configure-setting-wgMaxShellMemory: Maximum amount of virtual memory available to shell processes under Linux, in KB
configure-setting-wgMaxShellTime: Maximum CPU time in seconds for shell processes under Linux
configure-setting-wgUpdateRowsPerQuery: Number of rows to update per query
configure-setting-wgUseCombinedLoginLink: Use a combined link for login and account creation
configure-setting-wgUseTagFilter: Allow filtering edits with tags in recent changes, history, etc.
configure-setting-wgDisableHardRedirects: Disable redirects to special pages and interwiki pages
configure-setting-wgImportSources: List of interwiki prefixes for transwiki
configure-setting-wgRedirectSources: Regular expression to restrict URLs which will be displayed as 'redirected from' links
configure-setting-wgEnableDnsBlacklist: Use DNS blacklists to check for open proxies
configure-setting-wgDnsBlacklistUrls: List of DNS blacklists URL to use
configure-setting-wgUsePrivateIPs: Use private IP addresses forwarded by a proxy server to determine a user's IP address
configure-setting-wgDefaultExternalStore: Default external store for new revisions
configure-setting-wgMasterWaitTimeout: Timeout for waiting for replication lag
configure-setting-wgSVGMetadataCutoff: Maximum length to read from SVG metadata
configure-setting-wgSharpenReductionThre: Reduction in linear dimensions below which sharpening will be enabled
configure-setting-wgDjvuOutputExtension: File extension for the DjVu post processor output
configure-setting-wgDjvuPostProcessor: Path of the DjVu post processor
configure-setting-wgDjvuRenderer: Path of the ddjvu DjVu renderer
configure-setting-wgDjvuTxt: Path of the djvutxt DjVu text extraction utility
configure-setting-wgMemCachedTimeout: Memcached server connection timeout in microseconds
configure-setting-wgCacheDirectory: Directory for caching data in the local filesystem
configure-setting-wgUseLocalMessageCache: Make a local copy of the message cache, in addition to memcached
configure-setting-wgAdaptiveMessageCache: Keep track which messages are requested and load only most used messages
configure-setting-wgMaxMsgCacheEntrySize: Maximum entry size in the message cache, in bytes
configure-setting-wgRenderHashAppend: Extra hash salt for the parser cache and the sitenotice cache keys
configure-setting-wgDebugTidy: Put tidy warnings in HTML comments
configure-setting-wgTidyOpts: Options passed to tidy on the command line
configure-setting-wgUseTidy: Use tidy to make sure HTML output is sane
configure-setting-wgRawHtml: Allow raw, unchecked HTML in {{int:ellipsis}} sections
configure-setting-wgDisableUploadScriptC: Disable checks for scripts in uploaded files
configure-setting-wgHtml5Version: Value of the version attribute in the tag
configure-setting-wgWellFormedXml: Try to make the HTML output well-formed XML
configure-setting-wgAllowMicrodataAttrib: Enable HTML5 microdata attributes for use in wikitext
configure-setting-wgAllowRdfaAttributes: Enable RDFa attributes for use in wikitext
configure-setting-wgAllowUserCss: Allow user Cascading Style Sheet (CSS) pages
configure-setting-wgUseSiteCss: Use the site's Cascading Style Sheets (CSS)
configure-setting-wgIncludeLegacyJavaScr: Include the old JavaScript library and its dependencies
configure-setting-wgLegacyJavaScriptGlob: Assign configuration variables to the global space in JavaScript
configure-setting-wgResourceBasePath: Default "remote base path" value for resource loader modules ($wgScriptPath will be used if blank)
configure-setting-wgResourceLoaderDebug: Enable debug mode for ResourceLoader requests
configure-setting-wgResourceLoaderMaxage: Maximum time in seconds to cache resources served by the resource loader
configure-setting-wgResourceLoaderMaxQue: Maximal query string length for resource loader calls (-1 to disable)
configure-setting-wgResourceLoaderMinifi: Maximum line length when minifying JavaScript
Put each statement on its own line when minifying JavaScript
configure-setting-wgResourceLoaderUseESI: Enable embedding of certain resources using Edge Side Includes
configure-setting-wgResourceLoaderValida: Parse JavaScript modules loaded from wiki pages prior to minification to validate them
Parse JavaScript modules loaded from files prior to minification to validate them
configure-setting-wgAjaxSearch: Enable use of AJAX auto-suggestion for the search bar
configure-setting-wgAjaxUploadDestCheck: Enable AJAX check for file overwrite, pre-upload
configure-setting-wgCrossSiteAJAXdomains: Domains that may make cross-site AJAX requests to the MediaWiki API
configure-setting-wgCrossSiteAJAXdomainE: Domains that should not be allowed to make AJAX requests, even if they match one of the domains allowed by $wgCrossSiteAJAXdomains
configure-setting-wgJsMimeType: Media type (MIME type) to use for JavaScript scripts
configure-setting-wgVerifyMimeType: Check the MIME type of uploaded files
configure-setting-wgUseInstantCommons: Use Wikimedia Commons as a foreign file repository
configure-setting-wgSharedThumbnailScrip: Thumbnail script path for shared uploads
configure-setting-wgSharedUploadDirector: Path on the file system where shared uploads can be found
configure-setting-wgSharedUploadPath: Full path on the web server where shared uploads can be found
configure-setting-wgArticlePath: Base URL of internal links within MediaWiki
configure-setting-wgCanonicalServer: Server name with protocol to use for links to the wiki from other places
configure-setting-wgDeletedDirectory: File system path of the directory to place deleted uploads in
configure-setting-wgDiff: Path to the GNU diff utility
configure-setting-wgDiff3: Path to the GNU diff3 utility
configure-setting-wgPhpCli: Executable name of PHP cli client (php/php5)
configure-setting-wgScriptExtension: Extension to append to script names by default
configure-setting-wgServerName: Name of the server without the protocol
configure-setting-wgStyleDirectory: File system path to the skins directory
configure-setting-wgLocalStylePath: Same as $wgStylePath, but shouldn't point to an external domain
configure-setting-wgStyleSheetPath: URL of the directory containing the stylesheets
configure-setting-wgUploadBaseUrl: Base URL for uploaded files if shared upload directory is not to be used
configure-setting-wgUploadDirectory: File system path of the upload directory
configure-setting-wgUploadNavigationUrl: URL for the upload navigation link
configure-setting-wgUploadMissingFileUrl: External URL for upload link for missing files
configure-setting-wgUploadStashScalerBas: Path for image thumbs when doing remote on-demand scaling
configure-setting-wgAllowCategorizedRece: Allow to filter the recent changes by a category or one of its sub(subsubsub{{int:ellipsis}})categories
configure-setting-wgPutIPinRC: Log IP addresses in the 'recentchanges' table
configure-setting-wgAutopromoteOnceLogIn: Log automatic promotion in recent changes
configure-setting-wgRCChangedSizeThresho: Highlight character count difference lower than this in recent changes
configure-setting-wgRCFilterByAge: Filter $wgRCLinkDays to avoid showing links for values higher than $wgRCMaxAge
configure-setting-wgRCMaxAge: Minimum age for recent changes items to be purged
configure-setting-wgRCShowChangedSize: Show the amount of changed characters in recent changes
configure-setting-wgRCShowWatchingUsers: Show watching users in recent changes, watchlist and page history views
configure-setting-wgShowUpdatedMarker: Show "Updated (since my last visit)" marker in recent changes, watchlist and page history views
configure-setting-wgUseRCPatrol: Use recent changes patrolling to check for vandalism
configure-setting-wgRC2UDPAddress: Address for recent changes UDP notification
configure-setting-wgRC2UDPInterwikiPrefi: Add an interwiki prefix to the recent changes UDP notifications
configure-setting-wgRC2UDPOmitBots: Omit robot edits from recent changes UDP notifications
configure-setting-wgRC2UDPPort: Port for recent changes UDP notifications
configure-setting-wgRC2UDPPrefix: Prefix for lines sent to UDP for recent changes
configure-setting-wgBlockAllowsUTEdit: Allow a blocked user to edit his own talk page
configure-setting-wgSysopEmailBans: Allow administrators to ban users from accessing [[Special:EmailUser]]
configure-setting-wgEnotifFromEditor: Email notifications appear to be coming from the page editor (not from wiki server)
configure-setting-wgEnotifImpersonal: Send a generic email instead of a personalized email for each user
configure-setting-wgEnotifMaxRecips: Maximum number of users to email at once when using impersonal email
configure-setting-wgEnotifMinorEdits: Email notifications also for "minor edits" (user preference is shown and user needs to opt-in)
configure-setting-wgEnotifRevealEditorAd: Reply-to address of email notifications may be filled with page editor's address (user preference is shown and user needs to opt-in)
configure-setting-wgEnotifUseJobQ: Send emails via the job queue
configure-setting-wgEnotifUseRealName: Use real name instead of username in email "from" field
configure-setting-wgEnotifUserTalk: Email notifications can be sent for first change on a user_talk page (user preference is shown and user needs to opt-in)
configure-setting-wgEnotifWatchlist: Email notifications can be sent for the first change on watched pages (user preference is shown and user needs to opt-in)
configure-setting-wgUsersNotifiedOnAllCh: Usernames who will be sent a notification email for every change which occurs on a wiki
configure-setting-wgDebugFunctionEntry: Output debug message on every wfProfileIn/wfProfileOut
configure-setting-wgProfileCallTree: Print a raw call tree instead of per-function report
configure-setting-wgProfileLimit: Only record profiling information for pages that took longer than this
configure-setting-wgProfileOnly: Do not put non-profiling information into log file
configure-setting-wgProfilePerHost: Write application server host into profiling table
configure-setting-wgProfileToDatabase: Log sums from profiling into profiling table in db
